H0.text: What highly durable footwear is used to name a species of bat and crab, alluding respectively to nose and body shapes. Boot

H1.text: What highly durable footwear is used to name a species of bat and crab, alluding respectively to nose and body shapes. Mule

H2.text: What highly durable footwear is used to name a species of bat and crab, alluding respectively to nose and body shapes. Loafer

H3.text: What highly durable footwear is used to name a species of bat and crab, alluding respectively to nose and body shapes. Horseshoe

A4.text: The front of the nose-leaf resembles and is called a horseshoe.

A5.text: Horseshoe bats are in the family Rhinolophidae.
